job.title: Software Engineer - C++/QT/QML
job.description:
Job Title: Software Engineer - C++/QT/QML

Location: Asheville, NC

Duration: Full time/ Long Term contract

Requirements
  • BS Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or equivalent
  • Demonstrated understanding of programming concepts, architecture, and full stack integration
  • Coding experience in C++, QML, and Python
  • Prior experience with QT GUI programming
  • Comfort working in a fast-paced, highly collaborative environment relying on tools such as GIT
  • Ability to document both the requirements and design document as part of standard work.
  • Familiarity with hardware control concepts, such as motion control integration
  • Background in programming interfaces for equipment
  • Embedded Linux OS experience
You can also apply via: http://jobd.info/?id=SSrkKp

Recruiter Details

Praveen Rao
